name: In Between Games
description: In Between Games is a platform adventure game where you get trapped into your TV and you have to take the role of old classic platformer heroes in order to get out! This game is composed of three well known universes which come with an unique gameplay each!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Dual Core 2.0 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB Card DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space
